name: Adur Local Plan 2017

housing-numbers.notes: This is a capacity-based target (3,718 homes) rather than meeting full OAN of 6,825 homes due to constraints. Committed housing includes 559 completions 2011-2016 plus 439 permissions. Broad locations refers to Shoreham Harbour (970 homes excluding 132 already with permission).
